name: Cube World: Dog Simulator 3D
description:
What is it like to be a crazy cube dog? Try new dog simulator in Cube world series! Great chance to control a crazy blocky dog, destroying everything in the Cube City and biting people. Make a mess with this animal simulator and plunge blocky city into a chaos, but beware of the police! Being a blockhead dog is fun! Try Cube World: Dog Simulator 3D crazy game!

Be a dog. Act as a crazy dog. Behave like a real blockhead animal with this dog simulator – scary people, destroy everything, fight against other blocky dogs, escape from the police and find food to survive. It’s not just a survival simulator – being a crazy blockhead dog is fun! Meet other animal, annoy the Cube city citizens and do other crazy stiff with this dog simulator. Explore amazing Cube world being a blocky dog!

Better than simple dog simulator – your goal is not just to find food to survive! Battle against blocky street animals, run away from the police, bite people and complete crazy missions! Plunge the Cube City into a mess with Cube World: Dog Simulator 3D! Being a blockhead dog is fun!

Cube World: Dog Simulator 3D features:

Crazy dog simulator – bite people, escape from the police and find food to survive
Whole Cube city to explore
Cute everything 3D and everything Cube
Detailed blockhead dog to have fun

What is it like to be a crazy dog, a real blocky dog? Try this dog simulator to know! Be crazy enough to leave the Cube World in a mess! Bite everyone, escape from the police and other blockhead animals and join this crazy blocky world! Enjoy our Cube World: Dog Simulator 3D – the craziest dog survival simulator ever!
